subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0210_01C9E846.72A63620
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

"In the EM spectrum. some of those regions are covered by radio VLF (3000 H=
z to 30,000 hz), and ULF (300 Hz, to 3000hz). These are radio frequencies, =
and you can't hear them: they are electromagnetic energy, traveling in phot=
ons (yes, it is valid to call non-visible EM energy a photon)."

Ah..ok...t=
his is how I would say EVP are generated. 

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 2=
:26 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas





        You are confusing th=
e oscillation frequency (vibration) of the air and our ear drums, with the =
oscillation frequency of electromagnetic energy.  

        For example, we=
 can hear sound waves between around 40 Hz at the lower end to about 16,000=
 Hz at the higher end.  These are sound pressure waves.

        In the EM =
spectrum. some of those regions are covered by radio VLF (3000 Hz to 30,000=
 hz), and ULF (300 Hz, to 3000hz). These are radio frequencies, and you can=
't hear them: they are electromagnetic energy, traveling in photons (yes, i=
t is valid to call non-visible EM energy a photon).  


        --- On Mon,=
 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:


          From: Fran=
k Ratka <warrior18eii@...>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas=

          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009=
, 1:05 PM


                Tell me where the seperation on the spectrum ta=
kes place between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundwaves cause pressure waves th=
at our ears read as vibration and our mind translates as sound. The waves a=
re still on the electromagnetic spectrum. Even subsonic geomagnetic waves a=
re present on the scale. What I mean by power can be directll translated to=
 volume or amplitude. The only thing that distinguishes soundwaves from any=
 other wave is the fact that we can hear them.

                Frank R.

 =
               --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:


      =
            From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>
                  Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] New ideas
                  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
         =
         Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:53 PM


                        No. =
Sounds waves are not on the electromagnet spectrum nor are they a form of e=
lectromagnet energy. Sound waves are based on pressure waves in the air (or=
 in other substances).  Our ears detect these pressure waves and translate =
them into sounds we here.  Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet energy.  Our e=
yes do: that part which we call visible light.



                        -=
-- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:


         =
                 From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com>
              =
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                          To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                          Date: Monday, June 8, 20=
09, 12:38 PM


                                It sounds like she's saying =
"one, two, ....."

                                A mistake that a lot of =
people make is thinking that there are two different types of energy at wor=
k when it comes to sound waves and electromagnetic waves. The only thing th=
at seperates them is frequency and power. Radio waves are radio waves becau=
se they occupy a certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum. Sound wave=
s exist on that same spectrum just farther down with much longer waves. Sou=
ndwaves and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anything because of their w=
avelengths. The shorter the wavelength the more ways we can shield against =
them.

                                Think of microwaves. These are also =
a type of radio and telemetry transmitting wave but the waves also have a p=
hysical effect on our environment by causing molecules to speed up, which c=
reates heat. A little lower than this is IR or infrared it too can cause ph=
ysical objects to heat up but usually it just causes molecules to rotate in=
 place. All physical things give off IR light. Its a way the total system c=
onserves energy by spontaneously emitting IR radiation.

                  =
              Frank R.

                                --- On Mon, 6/8/09,=
 April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


        =
                        From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostres=
earch. com>
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New idea=
s [3 Attachments]
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com
                                Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:27 PM


 =
                               Here is some food for thought. I am currentl=
y reviewing my audio from our May 30th investigation.

                    =
            It was me and another girl teammate present in the room. I pick=
ed up a 3rd female voice on my digital voice recorder that I carry with me.=
 We were standing right next to another digital video recorder that I leave=
 beside my night vision camera. That recorder did not pick up this 3rd voic=
e. I have asked the girl that was with me to check her recording to see if =
she picked it up.

                                I have long felt the tru=
e EVP does not come from sound waves in the environment, or then it wouldn'=
t be EVP, but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are appearing directly on =
the recordings.

                                This instance with the rec=
orders may back that theory up. That other recorder should have picked that=
 voice up if it were sound waves in the environment.

                     =
           I am attaching the clip of this 3rd voice. The file that is name=
d "01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip. You will hear my voice as I say "Yeah",=
 and then another comes in right after that. I think I know what it says.

=
                                Again, I was live monitoring my audio, but =
still did not hear this until playback. It isn't clear, so I am not as exci=
ted about it as my one's from the last investigation.


                   =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
                                =
From: Frank Ratka 
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups =
.com 
                                Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
 =
                               Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


         =
                       I have a running theory that EVP is carried on an un=
trasonic wave and demodulated exactly where they want it to manifest. It wo=
rks off the heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic waves that diff=
er one another in frequency then if you add or subtract them together you g=
et a beat frequency or alternate frequency. For example, if a ghost is send=
ing a signal at 54KHz and you have an electric fan in a room creating an un=
trasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will have a intermediate difference fr=
equency at 9KHz, well within human hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was =
just an example, but all electronic equipment generates ultrasonic signals =
just by turning them on. From this theory I always felt that EVP were gener=
ated within a few inches of the recorder.

                                =
We are able to reproduce this affect in not only radio with superheterodyne=
 systems but also with acoustics and audio as in some passive sonars and a =
commercial produce called the "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.

   =
                             Frank R.

                                --- =
On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


                =
                From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
                   =
             Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                             =
   To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                                Date: Monda=
y, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM


                                Fascinating! I'v=
e had this idea that the EVP are often not recorded by the microphone but s=
omehow make their way in at the actual point where the storage is made, whe=
ther it be analog (tape) or digital. 

                                So m=
uch we don't know ...

                                Zack

              =
                   
                                On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at =
1:39 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


=


                                I monitor my audio live. The funny thing =
is that even so, those last EVP's I captured I did not hear either in the e=
nvironment, or on my recording as it happened. I only heard them upon playb=
ack.

                                ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
                         From: Zack Widup 
                                =
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                                Sent: Monday,=
 June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] New ideas


                                I am curious if anyone with=
 a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in real time.
=

                                I took part in an investigation of Ashmore=
 Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set =
up in the three halls of the building. The video for all was being monitore=
d and recorded at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at =
the camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might h=
ave heard if we did?

                                Zack

               =
                  
                                On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1=
2:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:


       =
                         Let's just agree to end this discussion about her.=
.. 
                                Why don't we discuss something on a lig=
hter note? Anyone have any new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
            =
                    Al

                                 

                =
